strings.ITEM_VOIDMEGACRABITEM_DESC: Become <style=cIsVoid>Voidtouched</style>. Every <style=cIsUtility>5</style> <style=cStack>(-25% per stack)</style> seconds, fire <style=cIsUtility>3</style> <style=cStack>(+2 per stack)</style> nullifying bombs which immobilize enemies and deal <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> damage. Auto-targets strongest grounded enemy. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all </style><style=cIsTierBoss>yellow items</style><style=cIsVoid></style>.

Every <style=cIsUtility>5</style> <style=cStack>(-25% per stack)</style> seconds, fire <style=cIsUtility>3</style> <style=cStack>(+2 per stack)</style> nullifying bombs which immobilize enemies and deal <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> damage. Auto-targets strongest grounded enemy. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all </style><style=cIsTierBoss>yellow items</style><style=cIsVoid></style>.
